CustomField.description: Core rules and process guidance. Defines what the model should do and should never do. This content will be rendered under an '# Instructions' Markdown header in the final system prompt.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide guidance for the agent's behavior. Use bullet points for clarity. You can include agentic reminders (e.g., to use tools or plan) and workflows here.
